mapper.sql: select * from (select sm.menu_id, sm.parent_code, sm.menu_name, sm.menu_code, sm.keep_alive_name, sm.path, sm.component, sm.redirect, sm.perms, sm.icon, sm.type, sm.hide_menu, sm.ignore_keep_alive, sm.hide_breadcrumb, sm.hide_children_in_menu, sm.current_active_menu, sm.order_num, sm.create_at, sm.update_at from system_menu sm) tb ${ew.customSqlSegment}
mapper.select: SELECT sm.menu_id, sm.menu_code, sm.parent_code, sm.menu_name, sm.keep_alive_name, sm.path, sm.component, sm.redirect, sm.perms, sm.icon, sm.type, sm.hide_menu, sm.ignore_keep_alive, sm.hide_breadcrumb, sm.hide_children_in_menu, sm.current_active_menu, sm.order_num FROM system_menu sm INNER JOIN system_role_menu srm on sm.menu_id = srm.menu_id INNER JOIN system_role sr ON srm.role_id = sr.role_id INNER JOIN system_user_role sur on sr.role_id = sur.role_id INNER JOIN system_user su ON sur.user_id = su.user_id WHERE su.username = #{username}
